citations.narrative:
The 2 rabbits are housed outdoors in an elevated hutch that is positioned within a fenced area. The wooden gate that
allows entrance into the area has 3 broken boards leaving a large opening in the gate. The openings are large enough
that predators would be able to enter easily. The gate must be repaired to minimize the entrance of predators. Correct by
March 25, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:

Facilities, outdoor. 
The 2 rabbits are housed outdoors in an elevated hutch that is positioned within a fenced area. The wooden gate that 
allows entrance into the area has 3 broken boards leaving a large opening in the gate. The openings are large enough 
that predators would be able to enter easily. The gate must be repaired to minimize the entrance of predators. Correct by 
March 25, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
